aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.p:
My name is Nikita. I’m a frontend developer who builds modern, clean interfaces with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind.
I enjoy shaping clear architecture, keeping projects organized, and writing code that still feels good to maintain a year later.

I follow new tools and approaches, steadily improving my stack and aiming to create products that are not just functional — but fast, polished, and reliable.

TzJs.desc: The first version I built. I wanted to add boards as well, but at that time I didn’t have enough knowledge.

DogLead.desc: A full e-commerce website with catalog, products and admin panel.

RedFax.desc: A multifunctional messenger with chats and audio/video calls.

TzList.desc: A task-management app with fast UI and clear structure.

Market.desc: A mini-market using a free API, featuring catalog and cart.

Ruqi.desc: Development of interfaces and admin panels
